member.name: E:UIElements.CharacterDisplay.OffCharacter
member.summary: This event occurs when the character leaves a character button, or the main area. This event can occur multiple times

member.name: E:UIElements.CharacterDisplay.OnCharacter
member.summary: This event occurs when the cursor enters the client region of a character button This event can be used to display a tool-tip, etc.

member.name: E:UIElements.CharacterDisplay.CharsInserted
member.summary: Occurs when characters are inserted into the character list
member.param: The button and index to insert after, and the text to insert

member.name: E:UIElements.CharacterDisplay.CharDeleted
member.summary: Occurs when a character is deleted (or moved, which is a insert/delete combination)

member.name: E:UIElements.CharacterDisplay.ViewOnlyChanged
member.summary: The parent should disable all context menu commands in viewonly mode

member.name: E:UIElements.CharacterDisplay.EditableChanged
member.summary: The parent should disable all non-readonly commands in non-editable mode

member.name: E:UIElements.CharacterDisplay.SendCharacter
member.summary: This event tells the parent to perform a send operation on the specified character

member.name: E:UIElements.CharacterDisplay.ShowCharMenu
member.summary: This event tells the parent to display a context menu for the character

member.name: E:UIElements.CharacterDisplay.ShowNoCharsMenu
member.summary: This event tells the parent that the context menu for the "No Chars" message should be shown

member.name: P:UIElements.CharacterDisplay.Autoresize
member.summary: TODO: Make this enable checks that change the font size if a factor of 2 out of place

member.name: T:UIElements.UnicodeProvider
member.summary: Provides detailed information about unicode characters.

member.name: P:UIElements.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:UIElements.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:UIElements.My.Resources.Resources.ClickToShowChars
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Click to display characters.

member.name: P:UIElements.My.Resources.Resources.LargeCharsetPart1
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to This is a very large charset (.

member.name: P:UIElements.My.Resources.Resources.LargeCharsetPart2
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Characters), and may take several minutes to display! Do you wish to display the characters? You may prefer to make your edits through the 'Edit Characters as Text' feature in the Tools menu. Remember that the smallest change will take a painfully long time..

member.name: P:UIElements.My.Resources.Resources.LargeCharsetTitle
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Large Character Set.

member.name: P:UIElements.My.Resources.Resources.LoadingChars
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Loading characters....

member.name: P:UIElements.My.Resources.Resources.NoCharacters
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to No characters!.

member.name: P:UIElements.My.Resources.Resources.ResizingChars
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Resizing characters....

member.name: T:UIElements.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.
